text: 1702 (MDCCII) was a common year starting on Sunday in the Gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Thursday in the Julian calendar. The Gregorian calendar was 11 days ahead of the Julian calendar as of the start of this year. It remained in localized use until 1923. ==Events== * March 8 - King William III of England dies. His sister-in-law, Anne, becomes queen. *date unknown **Delaware becomes a separate colony.
